name: MegaStudio Coins Manager
description:
Spend One Coin offers nothing in return.

Claim Free coins should work 1x / day (doesn't go over 10) *

Claim Extra coins works for 5x / day (goes over 10) *

Gamble can be used as many times as you have coins (goes over 10)

- some of the bugs are itch-related due to the save/load functionality of the game.

* values are reset at refresh
